text:
Sarah Hörst on Twitter: "Painted by chalkbot on the roads of the Tour de France years ago, it became my mantra in grad school. Still is: <https://t.co/P5RUwpcwz2>"
<https://mobile.twitter.com/PlanetDr/status/796529903558656005>
